application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to condition 11 (Obscure side dormer window) of Full Planning Permission reference 19/1279 dated 24 February, 2020, for Nos. 2-4 Prior Park Road: Change of use from commercial (Class A2) to gym and restaurant (Class D2 & A3) at ground floor level and creation of hotel (Class C1) above; erection of an additional floor at roof level; demolition of existing rear structures and construction of a 2-storey rear extension; provision of a rear service yard to include bike and waste storage facilities, restoration of the front facade and associated landscaping.Nos. 6-12 Prior Park Road: extensions to existing hotel including erection of 14 x front dormer roof extensions; erection of walkways between the buildings at 2nd & 4th floor level, 4 x 4-storey rear extensions, removal of the existing fire escape stairs and entrance steps, erection of 2 x rear conservatory extensions.
